baseline_groups.claim_summary: WTP for public recognition increases with gym visits (YMCA experiment)
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=0.103, p<0.001. Linear coefficient in YMCA coherent sample.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: WTP for public recognition increases with charity contribution interval (Charity experiments)
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=0.175, p<0.001. Pooled across Prolific, Berkeley, BU samples.

global_notes: Two experiments on image concerns. YMCA gym attendance (WTP for public recognition of visits) and charity contributions (WTP for public recognition of donation amount). 100% positive coefficients, 93% significant at 5%. Very robust finding. 74 specs total.
